question: Lord Mountbatten came to India as Viceroy along with specific instructions to?
option4: persuade the Congress to accept partition
explanation: He was not able to keep India united so he used the Plan Balkan. He was the last Viceroy of India and the first Governor-General of independent India. From 1954 to 1959, Mountbatten was First Sea Lord, a position that had been held by his father, Prince Louis of Battenberg, some forty years earlier.
